forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. West wind around 10 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 51. West wind 3 to 9 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco this afternoon, remnants of a delicate waltz between sunshine and clouds linger in the air. The temperature hovers comfortably in the low 60s, with a crisp breeze weaving through the streets at a gentle 10 mph, each gust inviting nostalgia for spring days past. Although the sky is partly sunny, a subtle haze hints at the encroachment of the marine layer, suggesting that the famously elusive fog may not be too far behind. Moments like these are best embraced with layers—perhaps a light sweater or a stylish jacket, perfect for transitioning from the warmth of midday to the cool embrace of evening.

As the sun dips lower in the horizon, expect the clouds to thicken, casting a tranquil gray hue across the city. With temperatures settling into the low 50s tonight, this presents a wonderful opportunity to explore the lively ethos of the city as twilight descends. A leisurely stroll through the Fisherman’s Wharf or an intimate visit to one of the local galleries would perfectly complement the ambiance. Whether it’s savoring a warm snack or simply enjoying the rhythmic sounds of city life, the currents of today invite a quiet engagement with the vibrant tapestry of Downtown San Francisco.
